Foto: Ritual Mandi Bersama di Lombok
03 Nov 2019, 12:37 by Harianto Nukman



Rebo Bontong atau Mandi Safar. Umumnya ritual adat ini juga dilakukan oleh masyarakat Suku Sasak. Salah satunya warga di Desa Gili Indah, Kabupaten Lombok Utara. (Harianto Nukman/detikTravel)



Rebo Bontong tahun ini merupakan acara penutup dari rangkaian acara Festival Gili Trawangan 2019 yang baru-baru ini digelar. (Harianto Nukman/detikTravel)



Rebo Bontong ini sebagai momentum untuk membersihkan diri dan menyambung silaturahmi. (Harianto Nukman/detikTravel)



Acara diawali dengan pemotongan tumpeng dan makan bersama masyarakat Gili Trawangan. Kemudian dilanjutkan dengan acara inti yaitu mandi bersama untuk membersihkan diri di laut. (Harianto Nukman/detikTravel)



Semua warga bersukacita, bergembira penuh tawa mandi bersama di laut Gili Trawangan. (Harianto Nukman/detikTravel)



Beragam kesenian tradisional seperti musik gendang belek dan hadrah turut memeriahkan acara tersebut. (Harianto Nukman/detikTravel)


Lombok Utara - Sebuah ritual rutin diadakan di oleh Suku Sasak, namanya Rebo Bontong. Tradisi ini mengharuskan semua warganya mandi bersama di pantai.

Photo: Bathing Together in Lombok
03 Nov 2019, 12:37 by Harianto Nukman



Bontong Rebo or Safar Bath. Generally this traditional ritual is also performed by the Sasak people. One of them is a resident in the village of Gili Indah, North Lombok Regency. (Harianto Nukman / detikTravel)



This year's Bontong Rebo is the closing event of the 2019 Gili Trawangan Festival which was recently held. (Harianto Nukman / detikTravel)



This Bontong Rebo is a momentum to cleanse and connect the friendship. (Harianto Nukman / detikTravel)



The event began with cutting cone and eating with the people of Gili Trawangan. Then proceed with the main event which is to take a bath together to clean themselves in the sea. (Harianto Nukman / detikTravel)



All residents rejoiced, happy with laughter bathing together in the sea of Gili Trawangan. (Harianto Nukman / detikTravel)



Various traditional arts such as drum drum and hadrah also enlivened the event. (Harianto Nukman / detikTravel)


North Lombok - A routine ritual held by the Sasak Tribe, called Rebo Bontong. This tradition requires that all citizens bathe together on the beach.
